content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: anvil
inventory=[{"type": "pumpkin_seeds", "quantity": 12, "index": 12}, {"type": "black_dye", "quantity": 54, "index": 15}, {"type": "lapis_ore", "quantity": 49, "index": 18}, {"type": "light_blue_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 58, "index": 24}, {"type": "blast_furnace", "quantity": 38, "index": 26}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 3, "index": 36}, {"type": "acacia_button", "quantity": 56, "index": 37}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_brick_wall", "quantity": 9, "index": 38}, {"type": "lapis_block", "quantity": 33, "index": 41}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 4, "index": 43}]
thought: To craft an anvil, I need to place 3 iron blocks in the top row of the crafting grid. Therefore, I will move one of the iron blocks from slot 36 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 36 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: anvil
inventory=[{"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 9, "index": 0}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "pumpkin_seeds", "quantity": 12, "index": 12}, {"type": "black_dye", "quantity": 54, "index": 15}, {"type": "lapis_ore", "quantity": 49, "index": 18}, {"type": "light_blue_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 58, "index": 24}, {"type": "blast_furnace", "quantity": 38, "index": 26}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 2, "index": 36}, {"type": "acacia_button", "quantity": 56, "index": 37}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_brick_wall", "quantity": 9, "index": 38}, {"type": "lapis_block", "quantity": 33, "index": 41}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 4, "index": 43}]
thought: I have already placed one iron block in slot 1, so I will now place another iron block in slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 36 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: anvil
inventory=[{"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "pumpkin_seeds", "quantity": 12, "index": 12}, {"type": "black_dye", "quantity": 54, "index": 15}, {"type": "lapis_ore", "quantity": 49, "index": 18}, {"type": "light_blue_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 58, "index": 24}, {"type": "blast_furnace", "quantity": 38, "index": 26}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "acacia_button", "quantity": 56, "index": 37}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_brick_wall", "quantity": 9, "index": 38}, {"type": "lapis_block", "quantity": 33, "index": 41}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 4, "index": 43}]
thought: I have now placed two iron blocks in the top row of the crafting grid, so I will place the final iron block in slot 3.
Ok
act: move from slot 36 to slot 3 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: anvil
inventory=[{"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "pumpkin_seeds", "quantity": 12, "index": 12}, {"type": "black_dye", "quantity": 54, "index": 15}, {"type": "lapis_ore", "quantity": 49, "index": 18}, {"type": "light_blue_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 58, "index": 24}, {"type": "blast_furnace", "quantity": 38, "index": 26}, {"type": "acacia_button", "quantity": 56, "index": 37}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_brick_wall", "quantity": 9, "index": 38}, {"type": "lapis_block", "quantity": 33, "index": 41}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 4, "index": 43}]
thought: I have now placed all three iron blocks in the top row of the crafting grid, so I will place the iron ingot in slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 43 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: anvil
inventory=[{"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "pumpkin_seeds", "quantity": 12, "index": 12}, {"type": "black_dye", "quantity": 54, "index": 15}, {"type": "lapis_ore", "quantity": 49, "index": 18}, {"type": "light_blue_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 58, "index": 24}, {"type": "blast_furnace", "quantity": 38, "index": 26}, {"type": "acacia_button", "quantity": 56, "index": 37}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_brick_wall", "quantity": 9, "index": 38}, {"type": "lapis_block", "quantity": 33, "index": 41}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 3, "index": 43}]
thought: I have now placed the iron ingot in slot 5, so I will place another iron ingot in slot 7.
Ok
act: move from slot 43 to slot 7 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 7}, {"type": "pumpkin_seeds", "quantity": 12, "index": 12}, {"type": "black_dye", "quantity": 54, "index": 15}, {"type": "lapis_ore", "quantity": 49, "index": 18}, {"type": "light_blue_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 58, "index": 24}, {"type": "blast_furnace", "quantity": 38, "index": 26}, {"type": "acacia_button", "quantity": 56, "index": 37}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_brick_wall", "quantity": 9, "index": 38}, {"type": "lapis_block", "quantity": 33, "index": 41}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 2, "index": 43}]

inventory=[{"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 7}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 8}, {"type": "pumpkin_seeds", "quantity": 12, "index": 12}, {"type": "black_dye", "quantity": 54, "index": 15}, {"type": "lapis_ore", "quantity": 49, "index": 18}, {"type": "light_blue_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 58, "index": 24}, {"type": "blast_furnace", "quantity": 38, "index": 26}, {"type": "acacia_button", "quantity": 56, "index": 37}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_brick_wall", "quantity": 9, "index": 38}, {"type": "lapis_block", "quantity": 33, "index": 41}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}]

inventory=[{"type": "anvil", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 7}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 8}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 9}, {"type": "pumpkin_seeds", "quantity": 12, "index": 12}, {"type": "black_dye", "quantity": 54, "index": 15}, {"type": "lapis_ore", "quantity": 49, "index": 18}, {"type": "light_blue_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 58, "index": 24}, {"type": "blast_furnace", "quantity": 38, "index": 26}, {"type": "acacia_button", "quantity": 56, "index": 37}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_brick_wall", "quantity": 9, "index": 38}, {"type": "lapis_block", "quantity": 33, "index": 41}]

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
